1111.content:
Once upon a time, there was a boy named Tyler, who was twelve years old.
He was a tall, slightly muscular boy with dark brown skin and messy black hair. His eyes were brown and average sized and he generally wore lime-green T-shirts with a picture of a daisy on them, blue jeans and red sneakers.
He went to Edison Intermediate school and generally liked it there as he was a happy-go-lucky boy and enjoyed studying, but the one thing he didn't like was his classmate Kevin.
Kevin was shorter and thinner than Tyler but he was very intimidating due to his loud voice and his grey eyes that could do a very intimidating stare. Kevin had tan skin and blond hair and wore grey all over: grey shirts, grey pants, grey shoes, "probably even grey underwear" thought Tyler. In fact, Tyler had never seen Kevin wearing anything that wasn't grey.
Kevin teased Tyler for all kinds of reasons but mainly he teased him about the daisy on his shirt, which he called him a "baby" for wearing.

One day, Kevin actually got Tyler to take an age regression pill. But how?
1111.title: by kevin the school bully

111311121121.content:
Just so you know, eating doesn't generally cause one to instantly get fat; your body has to process the food first and whether or not it stores it as fat depends on your metabolism.

However, Tyler was different because he was made a cartoon character, which meant he had cartoonish abilities. They included being able to jump very high, twist himself into unlikely positions, leave a bear-shaped hole in the wall when he ran into it, run very fast, float in the air (as long as he wasn't aware that he was doing it) and hide behind things too small for him. It also made him instantly get fat from eating and it made him not get full, so even though he had eaten everyone's food (and was now about 50% wider, as wide as a larger-than-average beanbag), he was still hungry, so he went to an ice cream parlor.

At the ice cream parlor, people had a mixed reaction: kids thought he was cool and wanted to play with him, while adults were either curious or scared out of their wits.
Tyler started to dig the ice cream out of the tubs and swallow down the cones and toppings too. He then stole everyone's ice creams, which made some little kids cry. He did feel a bit bad about this, but he needed to satiate his cartoonish hunger.

Jack takes one and pops it into his own mouth. In a matter of seconds, both boys begin to feel strange. Jack drops the pill box and sits down on a park bench and kicks off his purple sneakers and says "I feel strange." He reaches down to pull off his socks and sees the socks getting larger. Jack gets the socks off his feet revealing two lightly tan, smooth and hairless bare feet with pedicured stubby toes. His feet continue to shrink as does the rest of him. His shirt and shorts soon become to big and fall off him. He looks over at his friend Ben whose steps barefoot out of his shoes and own shirt and jeans fall off him leaving them both in baggy boxers and barefoot.
Jack looks down at Ben's small tan bare feet with pedicured slender toes as Ben splays them. Ben says "What happened to us? Why are we almost naked?" Jack replies "It was those pills we took." They grab the clothes, shoes and socks and run barefoot into a nearby forest behind the park. Both of them are barely 3 feet tall and look to be about 5-6 years of age.
Ben says "Let's get to my house past that big tree over there and get inside. My mom saved some of my toddler clothes in the attic we can change into." They continue to run barefoot thru the forest over pine cones and needles until they reach Ben's house. A while later they are in the attic and have changed into Ben's toddler clothes, but both Jack and Ben are still barefoot. Jack says "My mom is going to kill me for coming home barefoot again. She was the oldest student at the high school (she had failed multiple years.) and she hated the new arrivals to the high school with an unrivaled passion. It was this poor excuse of a human being that Jack decided to target. He noticed that she loved to drink fruit drinks, as she was constantly on a diet. One day, Jack bout one of the drinks, and added some of the pills. He could never remember what pill lead to what degree of age loss, but he just decided to add them quickly and give it to her before any sort of suspicion could be aroused. When he slipped her the drink (secretly swapping it with the one she had.), she scoffed in her usual manner, and then threatened to kill him if she ever saw him again. From a safe distance, Jack decided to check if the pills were working. At first nothing seemed to happen, but soon, he noticed that she seemed shorter. Not only that, but she also seemed to be... softer. Less defined. She seemed to notice this, and ran from the lunch hall, much to the amusement of the people seated around her. Intrigued, Jack decided to follow her. Quickly, and with a renewed sense of vigor, he strode across the lunch hall and into the hallway, where he saw a form fly into the nearby bathroom. This particular set of bathrooms were of the dingy, disgusting variety. The ones that hadn't be "clean" in years. It was a place that no one would be. 12532.content:
Jack couldn't explain it, he always suspected that he may not be straight, the whole concept of being homosexual wasn't absent in his family, his uncle had a husband and several of his cousins were queer. The only problem was that he wasn't sure how his parents would react, it frightened him to think that they could be mad at him for being gay. Before it wasn't overly a problem, he wasn't 100% certain he was gay since he wasn't really in love, but that changed quite considerably on his thirteenth birthday; the first few times didn't stick out too much to Jack, he had dreams of a guy, it wasn't until the dreams kept coming and Jack could feel himself yearning for him, it was then Jack started to worry as he was indeed gay. Several weeks past and Jack's love for this dream boy grew stronger, he didn't know what to do, how do you date someone who doesn't exist? how was he even able to love someone who didn't exist.

"Jack honey, is everything ok?" Jack's mum asked, sensing the boy's discomfort as they rode home in the car, "you look like you haven't slept in days."
"It's nothing really," Jack replied, trying to avoid the subject.
"Come on, I'm your mum," she reminded, "you can tell me anything." Jack took a deep breath.
"I've been having these weird dreams," Jack informed, "there about a girl, and I think I've falling in love with her," he lied, he wasn't sure what his mother's reaction would be so for now she didn't need to know it was a guy in the dream.
"Have you ever met this girl before?" she asked, looking at Jack through the rear-view mirror. Jack shook his head before answering.
"I've never seen them before in my life," Jack replied.
"Interesting," she mused, "you know in some mythologies they believe that people have dreams about their soulmate when they're about to meet them."
"Really?" Jack asked skeptically, "that seems a little silly."
"You may think so kiddo but how do you think I fell in love with your father?" she asked with a smirk.
"Are you serious?" Jack asked, surprised now, "you two are soulmates?"
"We'd have to be to still be together after the stress raising you brought to us," she joked it a wicked smile. Jack huffed before inevitably grinning. "Jack, if this person really is your soulmate that you're seeing make sure that when you meet her care for her and befriend her, there's a reason they're called soulmates." That night Jack went to bed and had the same dream of the boy that was apparently his soulmate. He looked at all his features, all the features he found attractive.

Jake started his daily routines for a Sunday morning, he watching some TV, had breakfast, watched more TV, had a snack and finally walked up to his room. After a few hours he walked back downstairs to the kitchen for some lunch, on the table however he saw an unusual note addressed to him. When he opened it up two pills fell out of the note, one was yellow while the other was green. He scanned the note and found a strange message inside.

Before you are two choices,
Two choices to decide your fate;
What happens to your body,
Depends on the pill that you ate;

If being young is what you seek,
Don't pick the green for it's too weak;

Jack looked at the pills and then back up at the note, what was it talking about? Perfect attire for stress relief? Seeking to be younger? It made no sense, though, that was what made him curious to try one of the pills. He looked at the two pills on the table, they had to be some kind of drug. Then again, it seemed odd that the letter was addressed specifically to him. He read the note once more before making his decision.

125321222122.content:
"Come with me," said the boy, "You will find out what you need to know," and took Jack by the hand. He then led Jack down a hallway and opened a large, dark green door.

Inside the door was an average-sized room with orange walls, a fuzzy purple carpet floor, and large windows that suggested he was on an upstairs floor but not terribly high, more like the top level of a large house than a skyscraper and showed a view of a city. The windows themselves had red sills and bright yellow curtains.

In the room were nine other people, but the one that caught his eye the most was a boy that looked just like his "soulmate" from his dreams!

Standing next to the soulmate was an older girl, about seventeen, with a look that Jack could only describe as "emo": she had a black T-shirt with a skull on it, tight, dark grey jeans with holes in the knees, black combat boots, a black wristband, and black hair with a strip of pink that went down to her shoulders. She had an average build.

Sitting on the floor just next to the emo girl was a skinny girl with deep brown skin and black, curly hair in pigtails, who wore a pink sleeveless dress and looked around nine.

Standing in the corner was a woman with skin that was also brown, but a lighter brown than the little girl's, and long, straight, dark brown hair. She wore a doctor's coat and had a stethoscope around her neck but was also wearing green leggings with feet in them, like a baby would wear.

Sitting on a red beanbag chair was a woman with fair skin and long, flowing dark hair, wearing a purple baby onesie and eating an ice-cream sundae with a baby spoon. Her eyes suggested that she was very deep in thought.

On a blue beanbag chair was a pudgy man with very short, black hair and skin the same deep brown colour as the little girl, wearing a T-shirt and a diaper and sucking on a pacifier.

Standing in the middle of the room was a gangly redheaded man wearing mainly normal clothes, but a bib and baby booties.

And standing in another corner was a tall, slender woman with very pale skin and black hair that she wore up in a bun. This woman really stuck out to Jack, because she was the only adult in the room not to be wearing anything infantile: instead, she was wearing a long, navy blue dress with long sleeves. Additionally, while all the other adults were smiling, she looked dead serious.

"Greetings, newcomers, and welcome to Andania!" said the boy with the shaggy blond hair, "This is a dimension where we value youth greatly. All of us, or rather *most* of us," he said, glancing at the serious woman in the navy blue dress at the word "most", ", wear clothes that people from your world associate with your infants. We, or most of us," he said, looking at the serious woman again, "believe that behaving like infants solves all our problems, and if it doesn't work, we simply take the yellow pills and de-age ourselves. Starting with today, we will begin sending people from your world who have problems into Andania. You may have felt some disorientation and even lost consciousness. Those are the unfortunate side effects of crossing the interdimensional barrier, but don't worry, you will all be quite safe. If you seem sick or injured, talk to Dr. Mackney", he said, pointing at the woman with the stethoscope, "If you want to report someone, talk to either me, or my assistant," he said, pointing at the redheaded man, "If you need any additional help, talk to Tamara," he said, pointing to the woman with the ice cream sundae.

1311.content:
"Does this burger taste funny to you?" Morgan, asked, chewing hesitantly.

"Well, maybe you shouldn't have bought food from a dodgy van?" Her friend, Jen, replied.

"Well, I was hungry!" She exclaimed. "What's the worse that could happen?"

Jen smiled and shook her head, fondly at her friend. "I dunno, I just wouldn't eat anymore of it,"

Morgan suspiciously eyed the sandwich, but then her stomach grumbled again and she took another big bite. "Whatever, I'll live," She muttered, between chomps.

The friends wandered down the late night street, barely being able to see 3 feet in front of them through the dark. Their 6 inch heels clacked loudly on the pavement, and the cruel wind nipped at their bare legs, under their short dresses. Morgan looked gorgeous. Her flowing brown hair shaped her adorably round face, where her big red lips, bright green stunning eyes and petite nose sat. Shaping her figure perfectly, the dress she wore clung to her, and made her dazzle in the street lamp glow. She was incredibly attractive, and the boys at the club had known it too. Like vultures, they had circled her, unable to take their eyes off her, begging to be able to dance with her, and she loved the attention.

Soon, they arrived at Jen's building, where she fumbled with her keys, her hands numb with alcohol, before managing to stick it in the lock. Morgan watched her friend stumble through the door, and considered briefly about asking her to stay the night. After all, it was dangerous for a girl like her to be out alone this late...

131121.content:
Morgan fluttered her eyes open as she felt something she hadn't felt since she was very young. A warm sensation appeared in her crotch area and she was shocked to find that she was pissing herself!

She was about to spring up when she heard the voice of a man, who seemed to be calling out her name. "Morgan? Are you awake yet, sweetie?"

It was then that she realised where she was. She was surrounded by wooden bars, either side of her as well as above her. What was this, some sort of cage? She shuffled around slightly and heard a crinkling that made her heart skip a beat. Nervously, she looked down at her crotch area and saw a thick, puffy white thing covering it. She was in a diaper!?

"Morning, sweetie!" She heard the voice coo at her.

Morgan peeled her gaze away from the diaper and screamed as she lay her eyes on a giant man looking down on her. For some reason, her voice seemed higher pitched than normal.

"Aww, don't be afraid, Morgan," He said, "I'm here to help,"

He lifted the wooden bars enclosing her in from the top and reached down to pick her up. She immediately started to struggle and to crawl away, but he grabbed her up all the same and lay her down on a cold table with crinkly plastic on the top. Morgan squealed as she touched it, and tried to get up, but he instantly pushed her down again. It was that point she became aware of her bare chest, but was horrified to find that her boobs seemed to have gone flat.

"What have you done to me?!" She shrieked, squirming under his grip.

"All in good time," He replied, shoving something into her mouth. A pacifier?

She tried to spit it out but he had stuck it to her face with duck tape before she could blink.

"MMMMHHH MMMHHH!" She mumbled.

"Sssshhh,"

The man reached for her diaper and started to peel it off, causing Morgan to struggle even more. The diaper was ripped off, and although Morgan tried her best to hide her nudity, she was relieved to get off the damp fabric. The man slapped her hands away and lifted her butt off the table by her legs with one hand. Morgan was powerless to stop it. He powdered her, generously, getting it into every crevice, before dropping her back on the surface with a thud. Morgan didn't expect to be hurt that much by such a small fall. She then watched the man take out some cream and rub it on his hands and between his fingers, smirking at her, before rubbing it into her privates, vigorously. Morgan blushed with intense embarrassment and begged for it to be over. Finally, he grabbed another diaper and taped it up, snugly. Morgan could feel the excessive padding on her butt and heard it crinkle at every slight movement.

Now, finished, he carried her over his shoulder over to the crib and carefully lay her back inside, locking the bars above once again. Morgan now realised that it wasn't a cage, but a crib. She tried to call out again, but only murmers came out as the man simply smiles at her and leaves. Suddenly feeling incredibly tired, Morgan can't help but fall asleep again.

1311211.content:
Morgan awoke later, having no idea how long she had slept. She found herself alone, and began to helplessly hyperventilate, unsure of where she was or what had happened. Nervously, she felt the crotch of the diaper and found that it was dry. Phew! Before MUST have been a fluke, she hadn't wet herself since she was way younger.

She tried to rise to her feet, but found it shockingly harder than usual. Her legs trembled on the bouncy mattress and she had to hold onto the bars to steady herself. The room was well lit due to sunlight peeking through the windows covering the walls. This was the first proper look she'd had at the room, and was horrified to find what looked like a giant nursery! The table from before was actually a massive changing table, with an ominous looking bin next to it, full of used diapers! The bars of her crib were twice her height, and she jumped to reach them, only to fall on her butt again. As she struggled to her feet once more, she looked down and saw herself. Her body was... different. She no longer had the proportions of the attractive 14-year-old she had been. It was almost as if she were... no! It's not possible!

Suddenly, the giant white door in the corner opened, causing Morgan to fall back into her diaper in surprise. She whimpered, as she stared in fright at the man who had 'changed' her before. He smirked at her as he came in, carrying something pink in his hands.

"Morning, Morgan," He greeted, "You slept like a baby, but then..."

"What's going on?!" I yelled. "Who are you?!"

He picked me up out of the cot and pulled back the seat of my diaper, peeking inside. I blushed, furiously.

"No poopy yet," He remarked, snapping it shut again, "But there will be!"

I starting kicking and struggling, but he easily kept hold of me. I felt so weak.

"Let me go! What have you done?!" I screamed.

"Oh, sweetie! Haven't you figured it out yet?"

I stopped in confusion as he lay me down on the table again and put the pink thing next to me. He smiled at me.

"Morgan, I've turned you into a baby!"

The room started spinning as I tried to comprehend what he just said. Millions of questions flew through my head, but all I could get out was, "Why?!"

He chuckled and pulled something up my legs and over my diaper. It didn't add to the thickness, but it squeezed the fabric tighter against me, but I was too preoccupied to wonder what it was.

"Sweetie, do you know how many people are willing to spend good money on people like you?" He questioned. "You're going home with the highest bidder!"

My heart skipped a beat as he pulled something pink and frilly over my head. It scratched my skin and felt uncomfortable and poofy, but I didn't care right now. I was listening intently.

"W-what do you mean, p-people like m-me?" I stuttered.

He smirked at me. "People who stay babies forever,"

I was stunned into silence. I barely noticed him pulling some sort of covering over my feet and tying something to my head. A baby... forever?! I was shaking with anger, nerves, confusion. Finally finished, the man picked me up, holding me so I was sitting on his hand and leaning face first against his chest. He turned me around when he reached the mirror on the wall, and showed me my appearance.

Over my diaper, he'd pulled on some pink frilly pants that stuck out in all directions, but not as much as my dress, which only concieled the top of the diaper, as when it reached a certain point, it puffed out like a tutu. It was the most babyish thing I'd ever seen. On my feet were cutesy little pale pink socks, with more frills on the seams, and finally, the most embarrassing was a lace up baby bonnet, white with pink frills framing the outside. But I barely paid attention, as my mind was somewhere else.

"Who are you selling me to?" I asked.

"I'm selling you to a family who wants a baby forever," said the man.
"Who is this family?" asked Morgan.
"A couple named Marjorie and Herb Simmons and their children Damian, who's ten, and Linda, who's eight," said the man.

142122.content:
In a house down at the retirement resort, an 86-year-old woman and her 88-year-old husband were sitting in their living room with a bottle of 'AR Pills' on the table and a glass of water next to it. Their names are Diane and Henry, the parents of Trent's mother, Samatha and grand parents of Trent. Diane recently bought some pills online when she heard that these pills can make her younger. But the reason why is because she wished to hand out with Trent more. While it is nice for Trent to visit them time and time again, she felt like she wanted to hang out with him more if she was younger. Because of this, she decided to buy these pills and make her young enough to be with him more.

"Are you sure you want to do this, Diane?" said Henry, her loving husband for over forty years that supported her decision.

Diane looked to him and asked, "Why are you nervous, Henry? I thought we agreed that it was best for me. You were the one who supported me taking these pills, right?"

Henry shrugged it off and answered, "Indeed I did. But the idea of you getting younger is baffling. I mean, if you get young, you won't be my wife and I would have to look after you. Is this what you really wanted?"

Diane looked to him with a serious look and said, "Of course, I do. I love my grandson as much as you, but having him here for a brief period of time isn't enough for me. But if I'm around his age, I might spend time with him more. I might even go to places he likes to go to. You know he has a knack for arcades, amusement parks, and movies. I think I should have the same type of fun as well. Besides, you are welcomed to join me if you like."

Henry shrugged it off and said to her, "I think I'll pass, for now. Still would be weird to have a teenage wife hanging out with a preteen boy."

Diane laughed it off and told him, "Well, if it's all right to you, I can act as a big sister to him, a role model if you will."

"Of course," he said to her, "I remember when you were a pretty at sixteen."

Diane just laughed it off and said, "You were right about me being sixteen." She soon picked up one of the many pictures on the nightstand and looked to herself back when she was a teen in an old time photo. Looking at this picture, she could see herself as a classy teenage girl. Wearing a Catholic schoolgirl uniform, she was a fair and lithe girl with an innocent personality. She had perky B cup breasts and a thin hourglass. Her arms and legs weren't toned, but showed some hotness for a girl her age. Her face, even though riddled with freckles across her nose and cheeks along with her upper chest, was cute looking with glimmering blue eyes. And her fiery red hair was done up with pigtails. Seeing this, she touched the surface of the photo and said, "I was quite a gal back in the day. Too bad I don't look like that anymore."

She look down to herself and could tell that she was the shell of her former self. She was a bit overweight and her back is hunched with droopy E cup breasts and arms and legs looking like putty. Her freckles face was heavily wrinkled and she could barely keep her tired eyes opened. And her hair was white and stringy and was in a bob cut. She sighed and said, "Age didn't look well for me. But maybe with these pills, I can be back to my prime, if I wanted to."

Picking up the bottle, she looked at the back label and read the information that's one it. It reads...

'Are you feeling old? Not feeling the energy and vigor you use to have? Wish to jump start your life all over again. Then you need AR Pills! Made by Dorado Inc., these pills will make you feel younger and make you better then you are before. Each pill contains an elixer and regress the body in ten years. So if you're in you fifties and take 3 pills, you will regress to your twenties. So take your pills, no matter how many you want, with water and soon you will become young and energized with your new life.

Warning...

The regression effect is permanent. If you regress to a number of pills you have, you'll have to grow up normally. Luckily by growing up, you can still use the pills to in case you get old again. Just a reminder, don't take too many pills, if you get a large number of pills that is over your lifespan, there will be consequences. So if you are ninety and take ten pills that result of 100 years, you will regress to nothing and you will die. Dorado Inc. is not responsible for un-concieve or death. So please, choose the number of pills carefully.'

After reading through it, she was intrigued and said, "Hmm... Says here that these pills take ten years of your life. So if I take 6 pills, I would be sixty years younger. Seems really fair."

Henry approached her and took the bottle to the read the instructions as well. "Yeah," he said to her, "But it also says that the the effects are permanent. If you become sixteen again, you will grow up all over again. Not to mention that you get a serious overdose, you'll regress to the point that you will die of un-conception. I don't want to loose you."

Diane looked to him and told him, "Don't worry, I'll make sure that I don't overuse that many pills. Besides, it's a risk I'm willing to take. But enough stalling, let's get this started!"

Henry heard her and gave her pills back. "Good luck..." he said to her.

Diane grabbed the pills and said, "Thanks..."

Opening the bottle, she was ready to re-enter her teenage life.

With him, was his nine-year-old brother Calvin, who'd come home from elementary school.

"Hi, boys," said their mother Samantha, enthusiastically.

Samantha was tall and thin (albeit a bit bulgy around the belly because she was pregnant), and had red hair like her mother used to have, which she wore in a long ponytail.
She was wearing a purple maternity dress.

"Hi, Mom," the boys said, doing the hand jive, as was their ritual when they came home from school.

Then, their father, Jake, arrived home from work.

Jake was slightly shorter than Samantha, and skinny, with a green T-shirt and baggy brown pants, and he had black hair, like both his parents did in their youth.

"And I learned how to spell, 'transmogrification!'" said Calvin excitedly.
